page.title: 15Stetchworth Area Shopping
page.content: There is a Community shop in Stetchworth, a Post Office and General Store in Woodditton, and as well as the village shop just off the edge of our block, a garage which sells small food items in Saxon Street. Most people do their main shopping in Newmarket or Cambridge, both of which have new Shopping Centres. For special shopping such as for Christmas, people sometimes go to Peterborough. Some people go to Bury St. Edmunds, where there is a very good market. Newmarket and Cambridge also have markets. Vans come round the area selling things such as meat, bread, milk, fruit and vegetables, fish, plants, drinks and icecream. A laundry van, Fish and Chip van and mobile library also come.
